Introduction

Girls Next Door was a seven-member project girl group created by the KBS variety show Idol Drama Operation Team. All the members were already a part of other girl groups.

The members consists of Moonbyul of MAMAMOO, Seulgi of Red Velvet, Sohee of NATURE, D.ana of SONAMOO, YooA of OH MY GIRL, Ryu Sujeong of Lovelyz, and Jeon Somi, a soloist under THEBLACKLABEL

Current state:
disbanded
